original_text: As for the other events of Menahem’s reign, and all he did, are they not written in the book of the annals of the kings of Israel?
korean_text: 므나헴의 남은 사적과 그가 행한 모든 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: As for the other events of Menahem's reign
are they not written in the book
of the annals of the kings of Israel?
